long_description: A great introduction to the fast-rolling world of 29 in. wheels, the Cannondale Trail 29er 5 hardtail mountain bike features capable Shimano components and a relaxed frame design to get you going. 6061 aluminum Trail 29er frame features a relaxed geometry for a stable, predictable ride. Rear stays are shaped to enhance comfort by damping vibration and lessening the impacts of bumps. SR Suntour XCM 29 suspension fork soaks up obstacles and rough trails with 80mm of travel. All-Shimano drivetrain features intuitive Acera trigger shifters and responsive rear derailleur to deftly move through the 27 gear combinations. Cannondale Helix 6 hydraulic disc brakes offer superb speed management for tiny finesses or big, outright stops. WTB Nine Line tires provide fast-rolling performance on medium to hardpacked trails. Platform pedals accept most types of shoes. Specs on the Cannondale Trail 29er 5 hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
